header_text: Your boss is watching your presentation in your meeting today. During the presentation, you stumble over your words a lot. You feel defeated.

elements.Text: Is it okay that you made a mistake in front of your boss?

elements.name: Your boss is watching your presentation in your meeting today. During the presentation, you stumble over your words a lot. You feel defeated._Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
